name: Chaser (AutoGhost)
author: Saffith
info: This is a recreation of the chaser enemy seen in Oracle of Ages, Oracle of Seasons, Four Swords, and The Minish Cap.
description: This enemy is a trap that does not retract. When horizontally or vertically aligned with Link, it moves straight toward him as far as it can. When it can go no farther, it simply stops and waits in place for Link to come into range again.
setup:
Set up four consecutive combos:

2: Starting up
3: Spinning - slow
4: Spinning - fast
